translationtableentry.text: The enemy fleet is retreating! Now it is time to finish them off and then take the coast and continue the battle on land! The time has come to capture the shipyard of Pelusio and, after that, the whole of Egypt in the name of Rome!
translationtableentry.result: Â¡La flota enemiga se retira! Es hora de desembarcar y continuar la batalla en tierra! Ha llegado el momento de tomar el puerto de Pelusio, y tras ello, de conquistar todo Egipto para Roma!
